txt.en: 'How can you say this? Did you not know Bori? You were there when he was captured! You know what he must be going through!\n\n'Do not think for a moment that I am pleased with this! Mazog is responsible for so many of our sorrows, as was his brother Bolg and his father Azog before him! But we owe Bori this! We must at least try!''
Mazog is too dangerous to remain alive!
